ExtendScript Toolkit Cpp Examples

This documentation includes details of the cpp samples that demonstrate the External object Architecture that can be used within the ExtendScript Toolkit.

The following documents may help to begin with:

  • Installing External Objects
  • Using the Sample Projects
  • Using the BasicExternalObject Sample
  • Using the SampleLib Example
